definition: to let go of sth/to give up
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
to scatter/to sprinkle/to spill
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
(fig.) trump card
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to have nothing further to do with a matter (idiom)

sentences.english: Three is afraid of in some way yet but would have died, free grudge.
sentences.chinese: 三是怕某些心愿尚未了却便就此撒手西去，空余遗恨。

sentences.english: I should think you could see that I may have to retire some day.
sentences.chinese: 我想你可以了解，总有一天我会撒手不干的。

sentences.english: When his wife died , the baby was two .
sentences.chinese: 他妻子撒手人寰时，他们最小的孩子才两岁。

sentences.english: When it became apparent that he wasn't going to survive, Tyler's mom talked to him about death.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒即将撒手人寰时，妈妈和他谈起死亡。

sentences.english: Don't reveal your trump card before the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 不到紧急关头不要亮出撒手锏。

sentences.english: She left a husband and a baby.
sentences.chinese: 她撇下丈夫和孩子，撒手人寰。

sentences.english: Otlet died in 1944, a broken man .
sentences.chinese: 1944年，奥特雷撒手人寰，身后萧条。

sentences.english: Flemingwas not to know that within five months he would be dead.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱明当时并不知晓自己在五个月后会撒手人寰。

sentences.english: Customers will worry you're going to flake out and leave them stranded.
sentences.chinese: 客户们担心你的信誉，害怕你会突然撒手不管。

sentences.english: A few days later my mother died of a massive heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 没想到几天后，母亲由于突发严重心脏病，撒手人寰。

sentences.english: The Indian government also appears to have washed its hands of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 而印度政府对这家工厂的态度似乎也是撒手不管。

sentences.english: Peter was fed up with his job and decided to call it quits.
sentences.chinese: 彼得对自己的工作厌烦了，决定撒手不干。

sentences.english: The old man breathed his last(breath)this morning.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人今天早晨停止呼吸，撒手西去了。

sentences.english: and never give up a thing because it was or inconvenient.
sentences.chinese: 决不因为事情艰难或者麻烦而撒手不干。

definition: to relinquish one's grip/to let go
to cast away
to let go one's hold/to give up/to have a free hand
see 鬆口|松口[song1 kou3]
doom/death/desperately
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to abandon
life or death/fate/no matter what/anyway/for the life of me
to throw down/to drop (bomb)
to swing one's arms/to wash one's hands of sth
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
callous/heartless
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
to lose one's life/to die/recklessly/desperately
